descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/27589-1-1354282309.jpg[/img]
Custom Very Hard Difficulty

- This mod replaces \'\'VERY HARD\'\' difficulty level with custom values listed below, so basically this mod makes your attacks deadly but enemies attacks will also be deadlier, pretty much the same as the one i made for Fallout New Vegas

Vanilla Values
.-----------.------------.------------.
|Difficulty/Player Damage/Enemy Damage|
.-----------.------------.------------.
|Very Easy ------| 200% | 50% | 
|Easy -------------| 150% | 75% | 
|Normal --------| 100% | 100% | 
|Hard ------------| 75% | 150% | 
|Very Hard -----| 50% | 200% | 
\'----------\'-------------\'------------\'

Custom Values
.-----------.------------.------------.
|Difficulty/Player Damage/Enemy Damage|
.-----------.------------.-----------. 
|1.VERY HARD | 75%  | 250% |
|2.VERY HARD | 100% | 300% |(my personal favorite)
\'-----------\'------------\'-----------\'
you can pick your desired values from the choices available 

= Installation
- just paste ESP and activate
(Note: only use one ESP, do not activate both 75x250 and 100x300 at the same time)

= Customization
1. if you don\'t like the values, you can customize it by opening the ESP with Creation Kit or TES 5 Edit 
2. now click Gameplay then click Settings on the top of Creation Kit, then look for these 
fDiffMultHPByPCVH - this is player\'s damage
fDiffMultHPToPCVH - this is enemy\'s damage
3. then just edit them to your liking, then save
check images for more info

= Notes
- this mod only increases or decreases the DAMAGE MULTIPLIERS done by the player and enemies, NOT the health of npcs or the damage of weapons or the protection of armors, so it should not conflict with mods that edit NPCs, Weapons and Armor

author: ghostrecon123
